about_the_game:
The Game Concept
SaiBorRai is a Meme First-person shoot em' up with Insanely overpowered enemies, tons of memes, lots of customizability and a some cool character abilities. taking place in a fictional world inspired by the cyberpunk and steampunk genres.
You shoot at everything that moves, try not to die, find memes, fight bosses, play minigames and have fun.




features

● Easy-weapon customization On the Go
● Memes... Memes Everywhere
● Minigames such as "WeebClicker and Pinball 3 double-D"
● Adjustable character lean that can break your spine
● NoobMode if you die too much
You can attach a 16x sniper scope to your handgun and climb walls in this mode as character heath decreases less
Note! there is going to be a parkour level if you like climbing walls in the future, but to access wall climb, noobmode is required

● WeebOS"The most Weeb Operating system in the world
● Cool Graphics with shiny walls
● Repair weapons on the toilet
● Loot enemies and get free stuff"You can pick up their weapon as they do not need it if you Finished them"
● Adjustable enemy AI that makes the AI either very stupid or Insane
● Bosses and Semi-bosses that has your teddy
● The Cat girl's tail is a USB-C charge Plug because why not?
● Decypher mode that does nothing but it looks cool"Spot Goons behind walls and check out the character in Third-person because she's freaking awesome!"








the story Of Nakano the Saiborrai

It's the year 2032 and Nakano finds herself back in the city of Aluminescence on a revenge mission against the goons who stole her farvorite teddy bear back when she was just 7 years old, They did also kidnap her parents and demanded a ransom, but as she only had monopoly money her request to get her teddy and parents back were ultimately declined.


To hopefully one day seek reuninion, she started to train at Aluminescence's most highly rated Dojo and became Samurai of the year. But as the RatKing took control of the Goons and became their leader, she knew they were too powerful for her to handle alone and she needed help, so at the age of 20 after many painful years of mastering SAiFU, she turned to the one and only Mr. Nakamoto and kindly asked him for help.
Though a powerful proccess and many Monolopy dollars later, he started to slowly replace Nakano's most crucial parts with cybernetics such as Ultra-strong cybernetic claws and high-fidelity hearing and eye-sight that gave her "SUPA STRENGTH" making her one deadly samurai.

The operation took several days and was deemed a success. As Nakano became history's first Cyborg-Samurai combi with insane 360 Noscope/Teabagging abillities, she was ready!.

It is now your task to help Nakano defeat the goons, Get back the teddy

content_descriptors.notes:
Their is Referances to sexual topics in the game via things such as banners, signs and minigames.
Their is also Sexualized characters wearing revealing armor suits but no physical nudety,
Certain In-game Characters does wear either slightly or highly revealing outfits that might not be suited for people under the age of 16.

The Game Concept
SaiBorRai is a Meme First-person shoot em' up with Insanely overpowered enemies, tons of memes, lots of customizability and a some cool character abilities. taking place in a fictional world inspired by the cyberpunk and steampunk genres.
You shoot at everything that moves, try not to die, find memes, fight bosses, play minigames and have fun.

● Adjustable character lean that can break your spine
● NoobMode if you die too much
You can attach a 16x sniper scope to your handgun and climb walls in this mode as character heath decreases less
Note! there is going to be a parkour level if you like climbing walls in the future, but to access wall climb, noobmode is required

● Decypher mode that does nothing but it looks cool"Spot Goons behind walls and check out the character in Third-person because she's freaking awesome!"








the story Of Nakano the Saiborrai

It's the year 2032 and Nakano finds herself back in the city of Aluminescence on a revenge mission against the goons who stole her farvorite teddy bear back when she was just 7 years old, They did also kidnap her parents and demanded a ransom, but as she only had monopoly money her request to get her teddy and parents back were ultimately declined.


To hopefully one day seek reuninion, she started to train at Aluminescence's most highly rated Dojo and became Samurai of the year. But as the RatKing took control of the Goons and became their leader, she knew they were too powerful for her to handle alone and she needed help, so at the age of 20 after many painful years of mastering SAiFU, she turned to the one and only Mr. Nakamoto and kindly asked him for help.
Though a powerful proccess and many Monolopy dollars later, he started to slowly replace Nakano's most crucial parts with cybernetics such as Ultra-strong cybernetic claws and high-fidelity hearing and eye-sight that gave her "SUPA STRENGTH" making her one deadly samurai.

The operation took several days and was deemed a success. As Nakano became history's first Cyborg-Samurai combi with insane 360 Noscope/Teabagging abillities, she was ready!.

It is now your task to help Nakano defeat the goons, Get back the teddy
legal_notice:
SaiBorRai does not actively connect to the internet and Hyrax games does not collect any sort of data from players.

Anyone who legally obtains the game are fully in their right to customize the game any way they see fit and are allowed to share "mods" with their own community as well as download and install mods as long as they have obtained the base game via steam.

Any potential mods to the game must be safe for other end-users to download and install.


The game does not contain Copyrighted material meaning anyone is in their full right to steam the game and showcase all of it's content such as images as well as much.
name: SaiBorRai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9650 3.0ghz/ AMD FX-6300 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960/ AMD Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound driver
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core I7 8700K 3.70 GHz/AMD Ryzen 2700X 3.70GHZ
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080/Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound driver

short_description: The Meme First-Person Shoot em' up in a Cyberpunk/SteamPunk world. Find Memes, Fight Enemies such as mutants and goons. Pick up your gun, shoot anything that moves and you'll be fine
